prompts: Create a legendary Pokemon that embodies the concept of creation and control over space.
Imagine a unique Pokemon that has a mix of silver and purple colors, representing divine power.
Show me a mythical Pokemon with a graceful design and the ability to manipulate time.
Generate a Pokemon that resembles a powerful deity, with intricate details and cosmic elements.
Design a bipedal Pokemon that radiates a sense of calm and authority, adorned in white and black.
Give me a Pokemon that can change its form, showcasing its adaptability and strength.
Make a Pokemon that is both majestic and mysterious, with ethereal features and a serene expression.
